IP address or FQDN from the device: IP address or FQDN from the device
TCP port (default: 4352, some older devi: TCP port (default: 4352, some older devices have: 10000)
maximum 32 ASCII Characters (could be le: maximum 32 ASCII Characters (could be left empty if projector security is set to OFF)
select the maximum supported class from: select the maximum supported class from the projector
sets the socket to timeout after timeout: Sets the socket to timeout after timeout milliseconds of inactivity on the socket. Default: 800
interval to refresh the power status, in: interval to refresh the power status, input switch and mute status (in ms)
interval to refresh the whole projector: interval to refresh the whole projector status, default 60000 ms (1 minute))
time to recheck the projector connection: time to recheck the projector connection after a connection failure. Default: 10000 ms (10 Seconds)
